scripts.dev: docker kill fetch-title-puppeteer; docker run -i --rm -p 8080:8080 --name fetch-title-puppeteer fetch-title-puppeteer node -e "`cat index.js`"
scripts.deploy: now --public && now alias && yarn run set-scale && yarn run remove-previous
scripts.set-scale: now ls | grep 'fetch-title' | awk 'NR==2{print $1}' | xargs -I {} now scale {} 1
scripts.remove-previous: if [ `now ls | grep 'fetch-title' | wc -l` -gt 2 ];then  now ls | grep 'fetch-title' | awk 'END{print $1}' | xargs -I {} now rm -y {}; fi
